verses.verse: When Israel <S%H3478><s%> was a child <S%H5288><s%>, then I loved <S%H157><s%> him <S%H7121><s%>, and called my son <S%H1121><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

The more the prophets called <S%H7121><s%> them <S%H1980><s%>, the more they went from them <S%H6440><s%>: they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> unto the Baalim <S%H1168><s%>, and burned incense <S%H6999><s%> to graven images <S%H6456><s%>.
Yet I taught <S%H8637><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to walk <S%H8637><s%>; I took <S%H3947><s%> them on my arms <S%H2220><s%>; but they knew <S%H3045><s%> not that I healed them <S%H7495><s%>.

I drew <S%H4900><s%> them with cords <S%H2256><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, with bands <S%H5688><s%> of love <S%H160><s%>; and I was to them as they that lift up <S%H7311><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> on their jaws <S%H3895><s%>; and I laid <S%H5186><s%> food before them <S%H398><s%>.

They shall not return <S%H7725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; but the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall be their king <S%H4428><s%>, because they refused <S%H3985><s%> to return to me <S%H7725><s%>.

And the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall fall <S%H2342><s%> upon their cities <S%H5892><s%>, and shall consume <S%H3615><s%> their bars <S%H905><s%>, and devour <S%H398><s%> them <S%H4156><s%>, because of their own counsels.

And my people <S%H5971><s%> are bent <S%H8511><s%> on backsliding <S%H4878><s%> from me <S%H7121><s%>: though they call them to him that is on high <S%H5920><s%>, none at all <S%H3162><s%> will exalt him <S%H7311><s%>.

How shall I give thee up <S%H5414><s%>, Ephraim <S%H669><s%>? how shall I cast <S%H4042><s%> thee off <S%H3478><s%>, Israel? how shall I make <S%H5414><s%> thee as Admah <S%H126><s%>? how shall I set <S%H7760><s%> thee as Zeboiim <S%H6636><s%>? my heart <S%H3820><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> within me <S%H5150><s%>, my compassions are kindled <S%H3648><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

I will not execute <S%H6213><s%> the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of mine anger <S%H639><s%>, I will not return <S%H7725><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: for I am God <S%H410><s%>, and not man <S%H376><s%>; the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H935><s%>; and I will not come in wrath <S%H5892><s%>.

They shall walk <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, who will roar <S%H7580><s%> like a lion <S%H738><s%>; for he will roar <S%H7580><s%>, and the children <S%H1121><s%> shall come trembling <S%H2729><s%> from the west <S%H3220><s%>.

They shall come trembling <S%H2729><s%> as a bird <S%H6833><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and as a dove <S%H3123><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%>; and I will make <S%H3427><s%> them to dwell in their houses <S%H1004><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> compasseth <S%H5437><s%> me about with falsehood <S%H3585><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with deceit <S%H4820><s%>; but Judah <S%H3063><s%> yet ruleth <S%H7300><s%> with God <S%H410><s%>, and is faithful <S%H539><s%> with the Holy One <S%H6918><s%>.
